repositories.author: mudler
repositories.name: LocalAGI
repositories.description: LocalAGI is a powerful, self-hostable AI Agent platform designed for maximum privacy and flexibility. A complete drop-in replacement for OpenAI's Responses APIs with advanced agentic capabilities. No clouds. No data leaks. Just pure local AI that works on consumer-grade hardware (CPU and GPU).
